page.title: 16Community Care in Bodenham
page.content:
Siward James Close Old Peoples Homes
There are 20 bungalows for Bodenhams Senior Citizens, 1 wardens flat and a community centre. The properties are owned by the Siward James Charity and were built 16 years ago. The managers are trustees of the Siward James Charity. 24 people live in the bungalows and 2 live in the wardens flat. The warden looks after the welfare of the residents and is there to answer any emergencies. The grassed area within the close is the site of the church fete and the bowling club have their bowling green here. The bungalows are in a central position, in a flat area and the residents are within easy walking distance of the shops and bus route.
